fix.after:
match (comp_val, player_choice):
    case ("rock", "rock"):
        output = "tied"
    case ("rock", "paper"):
        output = "win"
    case ("rock", "scissors"):
        output = "lose"
    case ("paper", "rock"):
        output = "lose"
    case ("paper", "paper"):
        output = "tied"
    case ("paper", "scissors"):
        output = "win"
    case ("scissors", "rock"):
        output = "lost"
    case ("scissors", "paper"):
        output = "win"
    case ("scissors", "scissors"):
        output = "tied"
